column4: I have a kind of off topic question. In my laptop I have 2x256mb RAM, If I buy a 1gb RAM, can I use one slot for the 1gb ram, and the other for a 256 mb ram chip?
that's a hardware limitation...you need to know the capability of your laptop as far as compatible upgrades
ok, thanks .. so it is ok to have 1x1gb and 1x256? :)
